Critical Power.name: Battery Energy Storage System (BESS)
Critical Power.description: Vertiv's BESS solution is optimized for mission-critical facilities. Our full-featured PCS—fast acting in 2ms—and the latest li-ion batteries, supports your sustainability goals and improves uptime.

Critical Power.name: Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS)
Critical Power.description: Protect your equipment and applications with our complete range of efficient, reliable UPS systems that can be configured to meet the specific needs of your critical applications.

Critical Power.name: DC Power Systems
Critical Power.description: Vertiv's thermal control solutions ensure optimal cooling and monitoring for critical infrastructure, enhancing efficiency and reliability.DC Power Systems

Critical Power.name: Power Distribution
Critical Power.description: Our power distribution systems stand up to changing needs and environments while ensuring the availability you demand.

Critical Power.name: Static Transfer Switches
Critical Power.description: Transfer critical loads to emergency sources with our line of quick, reliable and flexible power switching solutions.

Critical Power.name: Power Control and Monitoring
Critical Power.description: Run your data center at peak performance by making insightful decisions using our power controls and monitoring products.

Critical Power.name: Busway and Busduct
Critical Power.description: The Vertiv™ Powerbar patented range of busbar trunking ads overhead power distribution to your data center, allowing increased accessibility to power loads for maintenance. Our Vertiv Powerbar products also compliment the Vertiv Switchgear range to provide a complete power distribution solution.

Critical Power.name: Switchgear and Switchboard
Critical Power.description: Vertiv's power management software provides advanced monitoring and control of power systems, ensuring reliability and efficiency.You want a solution that ensures the proper flow of power to electrical circuits, protects your equipment, isolates power systems, and most importantly, does not fail. Discover the best power distribution solution to protect your equipment.

Thermal Management.name: Enclosure Cooling
Thermal Management.description: Manage heat densities of your IT equipment even in remote locations with reliable enclosure cooling solutions.

Thermal Management.name: Heat Rejection
Thermal Management.description: Efficient, easy to install systems in abundant configurations.

Thermal Management.name: Room Cooling
Thermal Management.description: Achieve unsurpassed protection, while reducing energy use, saving water and simplifying deployment.

Thermal Management.name: In-Row Cooling
Thermal Management.description: Solve high-density challenges with efficient, flexible and scalable cooling and containment solutions.

Thermal Management.name: Evaporative Free Cooling
Thermal Management.description: Transform data center design and performance with free cooling economizer innovations that offer the world’s highest efficiency and protection.

Thermal Management.name: Free Cooling Chillers
Thermal Management.description: Get reliable cooling solutions for vital systems in critical industries with easy-to-install Free Cooling Chillers.

Thermal Management.name: Thermal Control and Monitoring
Thermal Management.description: Harmonize and control your entire data center thermal management system to achieve up to 50% higher efficiency, improve protection and security and enhance staff productivity.

Racks & Enclosures.name: Integrated Solutions
Racks & Enclosures.description: Meet your IT infrastructure needs with scalable Smart Solutions products that offer cost and space savings.

Racks & Enclosures.name: Racks and Containment
Racks & Enclosures.description: Get flexible and cost-effective rack and containment products and secure integral systems in your data center.

Racks & Enclosures.name: Outdoor Enclosures
Racks & Enclosures.description: Secure voice, video and data electronics using reliable, customized solutions for small outdoor enclosures to large infrastructure solutions.
